content: row 7 slip_stitch slip_stitch k 7 times ssk k turn you made too many toe increases you can compensate row 8 slip_stitch p15 p2tog p turn here by making the foot shorter row 9 slip_stitch k slip_stitch 8 times ssk k turn row 10 slip_stitch p17 p2tog p turn foot gusset row 11 slip_stitch slip_stitch k 9 times ssk k turn row 12 slip_stitch p19 p2tog p turn repeat the below two rounds until there are 50 row 13 slip_stitch k slip_stitch 10 times ssk k turn heel stitches stop after a round 2 row 14 slip_stitch p21 p2tog p turn row 15 slip_stitch slip_stitch k 11 times ssk k turn round 1 row 16 slip_stitch p23 p2tog p turn heel k1 m1l k to last heel stitch m1r k1 row 17 slip_stitch k slip_stitch 12 times ssk k turn instep k across all instep stitches row 18 slip_stitch p25 p2tog p turn row 19 slip_stitch slip_stitch k 13 times ssk k round 2 k across all stitches heel chart for row 3-19 red line is the stitch marker placement heel stitches are worked back and forth in row until indicated otherwise instep stitches are not worked if knitting two socks at once complete the first sock heel row before moving to the next sock if working on dpns it is easier if you can get all the heel stitches on a single needle please note that row 19 is the first half of round 1 on the next page round 1 is used to connect the row back to rounds by continuing with the instep stitches * = see technique links at end of pattern © 2012 single stitch knit all rights reserved page | 2 https //singlestitchknit wordpress com pattern basic knee high toe up sock https //singlestitchknit wordpress com/2012/06/28/basic-knee-high-toe-up-sock-pattern/ both heel and instep stitches are now worked in rounds again fitting tip these increases were designed to fit an average calf size fitting tip of 14 15 inches shoe size women s us 7-8 a wider calf the ssk k of row 19 should be the last heel stitches if will need to add increase rounds more often than after not the count has gotten off either go back and fix or every 10 rounds a narrower calf will need to add fewer improvise by finishing row 19 with k sts and then adding increase row a very narrow calf may be able to get extra decreases at the end of the heel sts after round 2 away without any increases as the ribbing will take care until you are back to 28 sts of the fit round 1 switch to 2x2 k2 p2 ribbing for 4 or until desired heel no stitches these were knit in row 19 length you should have 31 heel sts instep k across all instep stitches bind off using *elizabeth zimmermann s sewn bind off or other stretchy bind off weave in all ends round 2 heel k k2tog k to
